docs.snippet: The San Francisco Giants on Wednesday became the first team since 1986 to win a protest filed with Major League Baseball, and will now get to resume a rain-shortened game the Chicago Cubs thought they had won....

docs.snippet: Justin Upton extended his hitting streak to 12 games with a bases-loaded single during Atlanta's decisive third inning, and the Braves extended their offensive resurgence with an 8-0 victory over the fading Cincinnati Reds on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Justin Upton extended his hitting streak to 12 games with a bases-loaded single during Atlanta's decisive third inning, and the Braves extended their offensive resurgence with an 8-0 victory over the fading Cincinnati Reds on Thursday night.

docs.snippet: The roles of coach, general manager, star player and team psychologist are wrapped into one powerful presence....
docs.lead_paragraph: The roles of coach, general manager, star player and team psychologist are wrapped into one powerful presence.
docs.abstract: Cricket, unlike most other sports, puts heavy burden on its team captains, who balance roles of coach, general manager, star player and team psychologist simultaneously; role is embodied by England's captain, Alastair Cook.

headline.main: In Cricket, Captains Wear Many Caps
